thread.title: As good as the first time!!
thread.title_full: As good as the first time!! - Review of Royal Garden Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 799kieranp
title: As good as the first time!!
text: Its always a risk when returning to a hotel for the second time after such a lovely stay the first. However, The Royal Garden didn't disappoint and we will certainly return again soon. And as a tip to all the lamb on the room service menu s as good you will find anywhere and cooked to perfection!!
